text:
8. Drink water regularly. The color of the urine should be light. Dark means dehydration. 
9. Take multivitamins every day 
10. Caffeine will help open up airways 

Those tips are from a nurse in the US. Will add more tips tomorrow. It was a busy day. 😴😴😴
